dandakaranyaya wanaye sahodarawarunta aayubowan kiya wanantharayen ma iwathata pamina dawas kihipayak gewunu ikbithi nawa dilliye parlimenthu widiye janthar manthar parishraya asala tharamak wehesakara wuwath wanantharaye siduwim samaga samipathawayak isilu wenath karyayak nirikshanaya kirimata mama awasthawa laddemi.janthar manthar yanu jayipurhi dewana sawayi ja sin nam maharajarawaraya wisin 1710 di idikarana lada nirikshanagarayaki.ee kalaye eya welawa dakwimata bhawitha wu,kalagunaya purokathanaya kala ha grahaloka nirikshanaya kala widyathmaka aashcharyayak lesa salakina.ada eya etharam unusum sancharaka aakarshaka sthanayak nowe.ee wenuwata prajathanthrawadaya sadaha dilliye pawathina kuda pradarshanagarayak lesa eya dwithwa karyayak itu karayi.

ohuge aachchi, abishalomge+ minipiriya wu mayakaya.+ 11 aasa raja thama muthunmiththa wu dawith men yehowa dewi yahapathyayi salakana de kaleya.+ 12 dewalawala mudalata samalingika sewanaye yedunu piriminwa ohu deshayen elawa damuweya.+ ohu thama muthunmiththan wisin sada thibu+ pilikul rupa* siyallada winasha kaleya.+ 13 boru namaskaraya sandaha sadu kulunak asala ohuge aachchi wu mayaka+ thawath pilikul rupayak sada thibu nisa aasa raja ayawa maw rajina padawiyen iwath kaleya.+ pasuwa aasa raja ema pilikul rupaya kaliwalata kada dama+ kidron nimnaye+ eya pulussa damiya.+ 14 aasa raja siyalu pujaniya sthana+ winasha nokalath+ ohuge jiwitha kalaya purama ohu mulu hadawathinma yehowa dewita wishwasawanthawa sewaya kaleya.+ 15 ohu thamage piya wisinda thaman wisinda kapa kala ran, ridi ha anikuth bhanda yehowa dewige gruhayata genaweya.+ 16 aasa raju saha eeshrayelhi raju wu basha+ athara digin digatama yuddha pawathuneya. 17 eeshrayelhi raju wu basha yuda deshayata wiruddhawa yuddhayata paminiyeya.
